name: Reddit - Wide + Comment Box + No sidebar
description:
v0.3
Fixed a bug with padding on the content div

Includes:

* boxes around comments
* sidebar removed
* smaller up-down arrows
* no external dependencies (images are embedded in the style-sheet)
* uses full browser width up to maximum 9999px
* centred content
* serif font for main content
* increase textarea width
* comments use full width of content area
* consistent link colour + different colour for visited 'nn comments'
* Used 10298 as a base.

Changelog 0.2
* fixed width bug with sub-reddits that have padding set on content div

Changelog 0.1
* initial release
